DOC.brief_summary: The DES-OSA Score and the STOP-BANG score were predictive scores for Obstructive Sleep Apnea. This study will compare, among patients scheduled for bariatric surgery, these two scores as predictive scores for a difficult intubation.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of STOP-BANG and DES-OSA as Predictive Score for Difficult Intubation.
DOC.detailed_description: The DES-OSA Score and the STOP-BANG score were predictive scores for Obstructive Sleep Apnea. This study will compare, among patients scheduled for bariatric surgery, these two scores as predictive scores for a difficult mask ventilation of tracheal intubation.
DOC.criteria: BMI > 30 kg m2 Preoperative Polysomnography Pregnant women ENT Cancer
